recipes.label: The Secret of Ker Ys
recipes.startdescription: The Where, the Why, the Who
recipes.description: I have studied the story of the sunken city of Ker Ys. I know the location of the hamlet on the English Coast which spawned from the sunken city. And I can feel within me that all consuming desire... (or that desire to consume all?) If I hold these in my brain, my lips and my heart, I can now find the path to Ker Ys.

recipes.label: A Sunken City... Missing Story
recipes.startdescription: I am close to understanding the secret of Ker Ys. I need to hear more tales about what happened there, so I can taste the truth on the wind as I sail.

recipes.label: A Sunken City... Missing Song
recipes.startdescription: I am close to understanding the secret of Ker Ys. I need to understand the passions that led the sorcerous princess to invite the drowning waters in. Can I also long with such ferocity?

recipes.label: A Sunken City...Missing Item
recipes.startdescription: I am close to understanding the secret of Ker Ys. I need something to help me narrow down the location. Perhaps I can find a scrap from its history?

recipes.label: A Sunken City?
recipes.startdescription: Somewhere between the White Island and The Republic, a city is said to have been lost to the sea. Some say it was surrendured willingly, from a lover's wilful whisper. Somewhere on this sea, I must be able to find more information.
